paragraph.paragraph: Title: An Eiffel Tutorial, ISE Technical Report TR-EI-66/TU.
First published July 2001. Corresponds to release 5. 0 of the ISE Eiffel environment.

See acknowledgments in book
http://www.eiffel.com/doc/page.xml#etl Eiffel: The Language
